description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Telephony Server elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2023-36005):

1. Download the appropriate update package corresponding to your Windows version.
2. Install the update to patch the vulnerability.
3. Restart your system after installation to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
- The following KB Articles are relevant for this update: KB5033379, KB5033375, KB5033372, KB5033369.
- Ensure your system is running a supported version of Windows to apply these updates:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2: 10.0.22631.2861
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.3803
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.

**Update Packages**:
- Access the updates via the following links:
  - [KB5033422](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033422)
  - [KB5033373](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033373)
  - [KB5033379](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033379)
  - [KB5033375](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033375)
  - [KB5033429](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033429)
  - [KB5033433](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033433)
  - [KB5033420](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033420)
  - [KB5033383](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033383)
  - [KB5033372](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033372)
